solution_line_template: 1 roll can wrap {shirt_boxes_per_roll} shirt boxes and he has {total_shirt_boxes} shirts boxes to wrap so he needs {total_shirt_boxes}/{shirt_boxes_per_roll} = <<{total_shirt_boxes}/{shirt_boxes_per_roll}={rolls_for_shirts}>>{rolls_for_shirts} rolls of wrap

1 roll can wrap {xl_boxes_per_roll} XL boxes and he has {total_xl_boxes} XL boxes to wrap so he needs {total_xl_boxes}/{xl_boxes_per_roll} = <<{total_xl_boxes}/{xl_boxes_per_roll}={rolls_for_xl}>>{rolls_for_xl} rolls or wrap
All total he needs {rolls_for_shirts}+{rolls_for_xl} = <<{rolls_for_shirts}+{rolls_for_xl}={total_rolls_needed}>>{total_rolls_needed} rolls of wrap

Each roll costs ${cost_per_roll} and he needs {total_rolls_needed} rolls so it will cost him {cost_per_roll}*{total_rolls_needed} = $<<{cost_per_roll}*{total_rolls_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} in wrapping paper
